resources.string: This is St. Lawrence University CS450 Implementation of the Monty Hall Problem. This application was created by Kira Murphy.
Do you want to switch your door?
How to play the Monty Hall game

In the Monty Hall game, you will be shown three doors. Two of the doors have a goat behind them and one has a car. You will be asked to choose a door. Before opening the door that you have chosen, you will be shown a goat that is behind a different door. After being shown the goat, you can choose to switch to the other unopened door, or stay with your original choice.
